name: 3oran
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(w3o(w0, w1, w2), wn(w3a(wn(w0), wn(w1), wn(w2))))

stmt.origin: bicomi(w3o(w0, w1, w2), wn(w3a(wn(w0), wn(w1), wn(w2))))

body.origin:
|- wb(w3o(w0, w1, w2), wn(w3a(wn(w0), wn(w1), wn(w2))))
-| wb(wn(w3a(wn(w0), wn(w1), wn(w2))), w3o(w0, w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(w3o(w0, w1, w2), wn(w3a(wn(w0), wn(w1), wn(w2))))
-| wb(wn(w3a(wn(w0), wn(w1), wn(w2))), w3o(w0, w1, w2))

stmt.origin: con1bii(w3a(wn(w0), wn(w1), wn(w2)), w3o(w0, w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wn(w3a(wn(w0), wn(w1), wn(w2))), w3o(w0, w1, w2))
-| wb(wn(w3o(w0, w1, w2)), w3a(wn(w0), wn(w1), wn(w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(w3o(w0, w1, w2), wn(w3a(wn(w0), wn(w1), wn(w2))))
-| wb(wn(w3o(w0, w1, w2)), w3a(wn(w0), wn(w1), wn(w2)))

body.origin: |- wb(wn(w3o(w0, w1, w2)), w3a(wn(w0), wn(w1), wn(w2)))

cumulated.origin: |- wb(w3o(w0, w1, w2), wn(w3a(wn(w0), wn(w1), wn(w2))))

comment: Triple disjunction in terms of triple conjunction. (Contributed by NM, 8-Oct-2012.)
